headline.main: NEGRO ONE OF 15 IN SPACE COURSE; 14 Airmen and a Marine to Train as Astronauts

results.snippet: EDWARDS AIR FORCE BASE, CALIF., March 31 (AP) --Fifteen pilots have been named as candidates for jobs as astronauts. One is a Negro--the first to be chosen as a trainee for the United States manned-space program.

results.lead_paragraph: LONDON. THE undersea explorer Jacques Yves Cousteau recently made a startling proposal to the World Congress on Underwater Activities here.
